caller_intent: The caller is concerned about an unexpected increase in their insurance billing fee from $106.37 to $108 and is seeking clarification on why the fee was applied and how to avoid it.
resolution_steps: Agent explains the $2 billing fee is due to paper statements being sent by Auto Owners.
Agent clarifies that switching to paperless billing through Auto Owners' portal would eliminate the fee.
Agent sends a link via email to create an Auto Owners account and enable paperless billing.
Agent offers to assist in person if the caller prefers.
knowledge_required: Understanding of Auto Owners' billing policies
Ability to troubleshoot billing fee discrepancies
summary: The caller was confused about a $2 billing fee increase and its connection to paper statements. The agent explained the fee structure, provided a link to enable paperless billing through Auto Owners' portal, and offered in-person assistance. The caller was directed to take action via email to eliminate the fee.
